Name: Tales of the Past and Present: Fagaceae Peninsula
Description: Fuling in Egla Town is collecting these pages of scattered books. Go and deliver the pages found in the Fagaceae Peninsula to her.
QuestDesc: Fuling in Egla Town is collecting these pages of scattered books. Go and deliver the pages found in the Fagaceae Peninsula to her.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What's written in this book is deeply connected to the faith of the Ragunnesi.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The path of the Ragunnesi is blessed and guided by Sentinel Imperator... After reading this book, I can see why the Acolytes we've met are so devout.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Speaking of which, we met a young Acolyte with blonde hair and an adorable look. She even helped us find the way to the gallery.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can tell she's a gentle soul.
